trans-unit.source: Specifies the appearance of the border for a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> on a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Specifica l'aspetto del bordo di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> in un controllo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar" />.

trans-unit.source: This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> class.
trans-unit.target: Questa enumerazione viene utilizzata per la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A> proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A> property enables you to specify the style of border to display on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A> proprietà consente di specificare lo stile del bordo da visualizzare su un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> all'interno di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle> enumeration and how to handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> event.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle> enumerazione e come gestire il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.PanelClick> evento.

trans-unit.source: To run the example, paste the following code in a form.
trans-unit.target: Per eseguire l'esempio, incollare il codice seguente in un form.

trans-unit.source: Call the `InitializeStatusBarPanels` method in the form's constructor or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare il `InitializeStatusBarPanels` metodo nel costruttore del form o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Load> il metodo di gestione degli eventi.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> is displayed with a three-dimensional raised border.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> è visualizzato con un bordo tridimensionale in rilievo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> is displayed with a three-dimensional sunken border.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel" /> è visualizzato con un bordo tridimensionale incassato.
